[docs]def pr_sigmoid(x, scaling=1.0, steepness=1.0, offset=0.0):
    return scaling/(1. + np.exp(steepness*(offset-x)))




[docs]def pr_softmax(x, axis=0):
    x_exp = np.exp(x)
    return x_exp/np.sum(x_exp, axis=axis)
